name: BasketBall Kingdom
description:
How many baskets can you score? Use your problem solving skills and timing to bounce the ball into the basket. The skills used to solve each level are also the same skills used to solve physics problems.

Features:
- 100 levels
- Awesome graphics and sound effects
- Easy to use interface
- Addictive and challenging game-play
- Multiple materials that react different to your behavior.
- We believe so much in this game that we will add several new more levels soon!
- HD support
- Universal App
- Set objects to pop,attract, bounce and crash between them.
